entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 13 except minus 17 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning late in the evening and ending before morning. Fog patches overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
